pr_title: ClientUI: Add support for changing window opacity.

timeline.message:
ClientUI: Add support for changing window opacity.

Uses JFrames builtin setOpacity method to set window opacity. Requires  the frame to be undecorated and thus requires the custom window chrome option to be enbled.

timeline.author: raiyni

replies.bodyText: iff is shorthand for if and only if https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/If_and_only_if
replies.author: thebirk
